entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
